TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Log extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于将事件和异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides a property and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Log`对象提供了通过它可以访问一个直接入口点[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的日志记录服务。The `My.Application.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]'s logging services. `WriteEntry`和`WriteException`方法将消息写入到应用程序的日志侦听器。The `WriteEntry` and `WriteException` methods write messages to the application's log listeners. 可以通过应用程序的配置文件配置侦听器。The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 更改其中 My.Application.Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)和[使用 Application 日志](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) and [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). `My.Application.Log`对象是仅适用于客户端应用程序。The `My.Application.Log` object is available only for client applications. 对于 Web 应用程序使用`My.Log`。For Web applications, use `My.Log`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Application.Log`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.Log` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将事件信息写入到应用程序的日志侦听器Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：编写日志消息How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)| |将异常信息写入到应用程序的日志侦听器Write exception information to the application's log listeners|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| |确定位置`My.Application.Log`将信息写入Determine where `My.Application.Log` writes information|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 写入信息的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 编写日志消息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来确定的当前配置对象。You can use this property to determine the current configuration of the object. 在客户端应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Application.Log`对象。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Log`对象。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object.

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 创建一个新的 对象，然后将该对象添加到 集合中。

span.span: Creates a new object and adds it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个新，将其名称设置为`FileLog`，并将其配置为与严重性级别记录消息和更高版本。This method creates a new , sets its name to `FileLog`, and configures it to log messages with severity level and greater. 新对象然后添加到集合。The new object is then added to the collection. 调用的方法，如果尚未配置属性。The calls the method if the property has not been configured. 可以在应用程序的配置文件中配置跟踪源。The trace source can be configured in the application's configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来确定的当前配置`Log`对象。You can use this property to determine the current configuration of the `Log` object. 在客户端应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Application.Log`对象。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Log`对象。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 这是一个高级的成员;除非你选择不显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you select the **All** tab. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`TraceSource`属性。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `TraceSource` property. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |获取的每个信息`Log`对象的日志侦听器。Get information for each of the `Log` object's log listeners.|[疑难解答：日志侦听器Troubleshooting: Log Listeners](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/troubleshooting-log-listeners.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**|

summary.span: 将消息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中。

public: void WriteEntry(System::String ^ message);

span.span: Required.
The message to log.

param.span: 如果 message 为 ，则返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If message is , an empty string is used.

summary.span: 将消息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a message to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteEntry`方法将消息写入应用程序的事件日志侦听器。The `WriteEntry` method writes a message to the application's event log listeners. 在客户端应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Application.Log`对象。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Log`对象。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解的日志侦听器接收`WriteEntry`方法的消息，请参阅[演练： 确定其中 My.Application.Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteEntry` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md). 你可以更改默认的日志侦听器。You can change default log listeners. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用应用程序日志](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). 对于不采用重载`id`自变量，`id`写入到日志由下表定义。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the `id` written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|默认值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`WriteEntry`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteEntry` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将事件信息写入到应用程序的日志侦听器Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：编写日志消息How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)| |确定位置`Log`将信息写入Determine where `Log` writes information|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 写入信息的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 编写日志消息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)] 仅在客户端应用程序可以运行此代码示例。This code example can run only within a client application. 更改`My.Application.Log.WriteEntry`到`My.Log.WriteEntry`为 Web 应用程序。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` to `My.Log.WriteEntry` for Web applications.

exception.span: 具有部分信任的代码调用该方法，但是写入到需要完全信任的事件日志侦听器。

span.span: Code with partial trust calls the method, but writes to an event log listener that requires full trust.

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

public: void WriteEntry(System::String ^ message, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType severity);

span.span: Required.
The message to log.

summary.span: 将异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中。

span.span: Writes exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteException`方法将写入到应用程序的事件日志侦听器异常中包含的信息。The `WriteException` method writes the information contained in an exception to the application's event log listeners. 在客户端应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Application.Log`对象。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Log`对象。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解的日志侦听器接收`WriteException`方法的消息，请参阅[演练： 确定其中 My.Application.Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteException` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md). 你可以更改默认的日志侦听器。You can change default log listeners. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用应用程序日志](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). 对于不采用重载`id`由下表定义参数，写入到日志的标识符。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the identifier written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|默认值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`WriteException`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteException` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将异常信息写入到应用程序的事件日志侦听器。Write exception information to the application's event log listeners.|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| |确定 `Log` 写入信息的位置。Determine where `Log` writes information.|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 写入信息的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`My.Application.Log.WriteException`方法来记录的异常。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteException` method to log exceptions. 取消注释 `Dim` 和 `MsgBox` 行，导致 异常。Uncomment the `Dim` and `MsgBox` lines to cause a exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅[How to： 日志异常](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 仅在客户端应用程序可以运行此代码示例。This code example can run only within a client application. 更改`My.Application.Log.WriteException`到`My.Log.WriteException`为 Web 应用程序。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteException` to `My.Log.WriteException` for Web applications.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 具有部分信任的代码调用该方法，但是写入到需要完全信任的事件日志侦听器。

span.span: Code with partial trust calls the method, but writes to an event log listener that requires full trust.

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteException (Exception ex, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, string additionalInfo);
.method public instance void WriteException(class System.Exception ex, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, string additionalInfo) cil managed
Public Sub WriteException (ex As Exception, severity As TraceEventType, additionalInfo As String)
public: void WriteException(Exception ^ ex, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType severity, System::String ^ additionalInfo);

span.span: Required.
Exception to log.
The type of message.
By default, .

param.name: additionalInfo
param.span: 要追加到消息的字符串。

span.span: String to append to the message.

param.span: 默认情况下为空字符串。

span.span: By default, this is an empty string.

summary.span: 将异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中。

span.span: Writes exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteException`方法将写入到应用程序的事件日志侦听器异常中包含的信息。The `WriteException` method writes the information contained in an exception to the application's event log listeners. 在客户端应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Application.Log`对象。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 应用程序，`Log`对象是可通过`My.Log`对象。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解的日志侦听器接收`WriteException`方法的消息，请参阅[演练： 确定其中 My.Application.Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteException` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md). 你可以更改默认的日志侦听器。You can change default log listeners. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用应用程序日志](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). 对于不采用重载`id`由下表定义参数，写入到日志的标识符。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the identifier written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|默认值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`WriteException`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteException` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将异常信息写入到应用程序的事件日志侦听器。Write exception information to the application's event log listeners.|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| |确定 `Log` 写入信息的位置。Determine where `Log` writes information.|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 写入信息的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用`My.Application.Log.WriteException`方法来记录的异常。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteException` method to log exceptions. 取消注释 `Dim` 和 `MsgBox` 行，导致 异常。Uncomment the `Dim` and `MsgBox` lines to cause a exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅[How to： 日志异常](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 仅在客户端应用程序可以运行此代码示例。This code example can run only within a client application. 更改`My.Application.Log.WriteException`到`My.Log.WriteException`为 Web 应用程序。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteException` to `My.Log.WriteException` for Web applications.
